scripts.test:local: bash -c 'set -o pipefail && docker compose up --build --abort-on-container-exit 2>&1 | grep -v "backend-socket "'
scripts.test:down: docker compose down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.deployed.yml down -v
scripts.test:clean: docker compose down -v --rmi all && docker compose -f docker-compose.deployed.yml down -v --rmi all
